caption.title: Models trained on distribution records in Europe
caption.p: Habitat suitability of common ragweed ( A. artemisiifolia) (A–C) , perennial ragweed ( A. psilostachya) (D–F) and giant ragweed ( A. trifida) (G–I) in Europe under current climate conditions, and future climates (projections for years 2070–2099) assuming RCP 6.0 and RCP 8.5. Maps show average MAXENT values, derived from 15 replicates.
Click here for additional data file.
